content: easiest ever lacy blanket by janice helge blanket measures approximately 18 wide by 20 long perfect for using in a baby carrier or car seat or for a tiny infant materials 6 ozs lion brand baby soft or other soft machine washable dk or sport yarn size 9/5 5 mm knitting needles gauge 4 to 5 sts = 1 not important with this blanket but better to have a loose fabric than a dense one page �1 of �3 abbreviations k = knit k2tog = knit two stitches together sts = stitches yo = yarn over needle cast on 91 sts knit 3 row in garter stitch for the edging row 1 k3 purl across to last 3 sts k3 row 2 k3 k2 decrease 3 times yo k1 yo 5 times * k2 decrease 6 times yo k1 yo 5 times repeat from * across to last 9 sts k2 decrease 3 times k3 row 3 and 4 knit across repeat row 1 through 4 until blanket measures approximately 20 inches or to desired length knit 2 more row bind off all stitches loosely on the wrong side notes want to use worsted weight yarn change the size of the needle to a 10/6 0 mm to make a smaller version using about 5 ozs of worsted weight yarn and size 10/6 0 mm needles cast on 74 stitches and follow the pattern row above this will make a blanket about 16 wide by 18-1/2 long one skein of dream in color classy makes a lovely blanket the magic number to increase or decrease this pattern is 17 stitches ©january 2004 updated 16 july 2019 by janice helge mokena il page �2 of �3 tips because it is easy to lose your place while knitting this blanket s lace pattern here are some tips look at your working needle on the wrong side if you have a row of purl bumps directly under the working needle k3 purl across the row to the last 3 stitches k3 on the right side if you have two row of stockinette stitch under the needle and two row of purl bumps on the wrong side work lace pattern row 2 on the wrong side if you can see the yarn overs in the last row knit the row on the right side if you have a row of purl bumps directly under the working needle knit the row 91-stitch blanket knit with berroco comfort yarn page �3 of �3
